site.title: vermillionpaws | developer
site.description: Personal website of a developer who loves creating cool stuff with code

home.intro: Hey! Welcome to my little corner of the internet. I'm a developer who loves creating cool stuff with code.
home.neovimDesc: I'm obsessed with customizing my editor
home.luaScriptingDesc: Mostly for my Neovim config, lol
home.uiuxDesignDesc: I like making things look pretty
home.workflowOptimizationDesc: I spend way too much time on this
home.webglDesc: Still learning, but I love the shiny stuff
home.ctaDescription: I'm not really looking for big collaborations, but I'm always down to chat about code, games, or whatever!

intro.part1: I got into programming because I love when things look good AND work well. I spend way too much time tweaking how my code editor looks, and I'm pretty obsessed with making websites that don't just function, but actually feel nice to use.
intro.part2: I mostly work with modern web stuff - Astro, React, TypeScript, that kind of thing. I try to keep my projects simple and clean, but I can't resist adding little animations and details that make things feel special.
intro.part3: When I'm not coding, I'm probably playing video games, binge-watching something, or endlessly customizing my Linux setup. I also spend way too much time on Discord.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Working with modern web frameworks and technologies to build responsive, accessible, and performant websites and applications.

systemAdmin.title: System Administration & Security
systemAdmin.description: Managing system administration tasks and implementing security practices across various systems including Linux and BSD environments.

linuxJourney.title: Linux Journey
linuxJourney.description: Exploring various Linux distributions and customizing environments. Experienced with multiple editors including Neovim, Vim, Emacs, VSCode, Kakoune, and Vis.

status.title: Just Vibing
status.description: I'm mostly focused on personal projects right now, but I'm always down to chat about code or swap ideas!

empty.title: No posts yet!
empty.description: I'm still working on my first blog post. Check back soon for updates about my projects and tech adventures!
